summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 3, 7, 12 and 18 of the Housing Preservation Ordinance (109220), as amended by Ordinance 109432, to exempt certain housing units from this ordinance, providing relocation assistance to certain tenants evicted prior to an application for a demolition icense, establishing the demolition license fee in the Metropolitan Business (BM) zone, and establishing penalties for violations.
